item.title: PEPSICO INC 10-K
item.description: PEPSICO INC, which is in the Beverages [2080] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 09, 2023 had 40017 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 334 instances pepsico - 291 instances including - 286 instances financial - 277 instances tax - 259 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
